data.title: Failed to start Editor when build using MinGW
data.body:
Urho Editor failed to start when built using MinGW. It shows up this error:
![editor-bug](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5253453/3472493/6a0c019c-02cc-11e4-90cc-9bc4be1a5814.jpg)
I'm using Windows 7 x64 SP1 and master branch Urho with OpenGL. This error started happen after I pull the latest source today.

data.title: Support fullscreen resolutions not matching aspect ratio
data.body: Graphics class uses SDL_GetDisplayMode() to enumerate supported fullscreen resolutions. At least on Windows this will not report back all supported resolutions (especially ones that don't match aspect ratio), which will cause another resolution to be chosen, though for the driver would actually support the requested one, for example 1024 x 768.

data.title: GLSL #version directive
Update to Box2D 2.3.1
Collisions not Registering
data.body:
I have a situation where I'm calling PhysicsWorld::GetRigidBodies; two rigid body objects are colliding with the specified rigid body, but the resulting list is empty.
1. Collision masks and layers are set appropriately- the objects should be colliding.
2. The colliders are appropriately shaped, and using DrawDebugGeometry clearly shows the colliders are intersecting.
3. The call is within a method triggered by the PostUpdate event.

data.title: Test 32_Urho2DConstraints_d.exe assertion failed
data.body:
Compiled with vs2013, debug, w7 x64, test 32_Urho2DConstraints_d.exe crashes.
Release version works fine.

http://tinypic.com/r/4zxddy/8

data.title: [Editor] Delete keyboard shortcut doesn't work on OS X
data.body: On a MacBook, there is no true "Delete" key (above the arrow keys on a full keyboard), so the "Delete" key is simply backspace. It doesn't register in the Editor.

data.title: Added Dome model with UV Map
data.body: Dome model with UV map for skydomes

data.title: KTX support
data.body: It would be nice to have KTX support as an alternative to DDS. It's the KhronosGroup Texture format.

data.title: Can't import blender files
data.body:
I'm trying to import some blend files with AssertImporter, but failed.

Here is the error message:

```
Reading file Box.blend
Could not open or parse input file Box.blend
```

data.title: Meshless model was sometimes not importable
data.body:
assimp generates skeleton mesh at root node using SkeletonMeshBuilder class when importing meshless model. However during this process, child nodes that overlaps with their parent nodes were not considered as bone. This caused "multiple root nodes are not supported" error in CollectBones function.

I modified conditions in CollectBones bit to handle meshless model.

data.title: TransformSpace was ignored in Node::LookAt
problem in Node::LookAt?
Bullet RaycastVehicle
data.body: Add support for Bullet's RaycastVehicle, or a similar mechanism, as rigidbody-based vehicles (like in the current VehicleDemo) stutter on internal triangle edges and can't easily simulate the suspension properly.

data.title: DetourCrowd navigation agents
data.body: Add the DetourCrowd library, and support for its navigation agents as components that move their scene node toward the assigned target.

data.title: Support click/drag events for multiple simultaneous UI elements
data.body: Currently a single element is tracked for click & drag UI events, which is not sufficient on multitouch input.

data.title: how to import ogre format 's material to urho3d
iOS main loop issue
data.body:
on iOS, running main loop blocks other system window to show up such like GameCenter. To solve this issue, SDL has implemented iOS specific API "SDL_iPhoneSetAnimationCallback" which invokes callback function to update frame.

https://forums.libsdl.org/viewtopic.php?t=8247&sid=596bc8bfc29ce5898c0046ecaec875d6

Doesn't require much code changes but it would be nice if Urho3D supported this officially

data.title: CI build for iOS platform exceeding 50 minutes time limit
data.body:
A full release/package build is triggered automatically when the CI build detects public APIs changes. We have constantly got error build result for iOS 64-bit platform now due to the build time limit. To fit into the time limit, we could either:
1. Exclude some of the samples from the build, or
2. Remove documentation build, or
3. Does not create Mach-O universal binary for all the supported archs (both 32- and 64-bit), or
4. Become one of the Travis-CI premium customer (which would buy us another 20 minutes or so).

The first three options is doable but the content of the build artifact will not be as complete as before. The last option requires moolah. In any case, we need to do something about it so that it does not give a false alarm on the state of the master branch.

data.title: Manual resources and Graphics::Restore
fix android crash on some devices (e.g. Tmall Magic Box).
Urho2D documentation update
Minor issue - Editor's script directory for batch
data.body:
Real minor issue, shall we add **%~dp0** (without trailing slash) beside each "Urho3DPlayer.exe" in **/Bin/Editor.bat** to reflect a similar behaviour as **/Bin/Editor.sh** with its **$( dirname $0 )**?

I had an issue while running the batch file once (Urho3DPlayer.exe not found), though it seemed to work properly after...

data.title: Assimp new build - FBX files - Embeded resources.
data.body:
Hello, 
Animated fbx files weren't imported properly however I rebuild AssetImporter project with latest github version of the assimp library. Now Fbx files and animations are properly imported. There were a lot of change to assimp. I recomend you to try it out.

Eventough I embed textures in to fbx files. Assimp doesn't put them  to generated Textures folder. It complaints about not to find textures. But textures are there.

data.title: Pan editor camera w/ shift+middle mouse button
data.body:
This is a slightly different approach to panning in the editor then #372

This just adds middle mouse button + shift.  It however loses the speed modifier and defaults to the base multiplier.
